TextBody:
Hello Prerana,

Thank you for contacting us.

Could you please provide us more details about the logs that you need to export?

Are these logs for CAP or DC or is it something else?

Also, if you could provide some relevant screenshots related to them, it would be helpful.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

Hello Prerana,

You might want to check the maximum records to display.

For that, go to Device Control->Global Settings and scroll to the bottom until you find the below option:



And try again.

Looking forward to your response.
Best Regards,

I understand what you are trying to achieve.

As of right now I am investigating internally to see if there's a way to export the sub logs that you are requesting  under each CAP log.

I will get back to you and let you know what I found as soon as possible.

We appreciate your patience!

Best Regards,

TextBody:
Hello Prerana,

I am following up in regards of your inquiry related to the CAP reports.

I've checked the CAP reports options from under Reports and Analysis -> CAP Reports and in order for you to have the sub logs details(Items/Matched Items/Matched Types) and to not generate them for the entire list of computers, you can simply filter the logs first by using the below filter details:



After you filter the logs, please use the Create Export function->Select CSV or Excel:


Then click on View Export List. From there you will have the ability to download the logs.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
